function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of poor indoor quality including natural lighting, acoustic comfort, thermo-hygrometric comfort, and privacy during phone calls","Impact":"Increased risk of stress, discomfort, and reduced productivity","Mitigation":"Improving indoor quality through better design, technology, and maintenance","Technologies":"Smart lighting, soundproofing, climate control, privacy screens","People":"Occupants, especially those spending long hours indoors","Owner":"Architects, building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Presence of high depressive symptoms among students","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health, well-being, and academic performance","Mitigation":"Early intervention, mental health support, and positive environmental design","Technologies":"Stress monitoring apps, mental health resources, sensory room design","People":"Students, educational institutions, healthcare providers","Owner":"Educational institutions, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Association between architectural parameters and depressive symptoms","Impact":"Insights into the impact of built environment on mental health","Mitigation":"Further research and evidence-based design strategies","Technologies":"Behavioral tracking, environmental sensors, data analytics","People":"Architects, researchers, mental health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, architectural firms"}]}
